name: openSquat
description: The openSquat is an open-source project for phishing domain and domain squatting detection by searching daily newly registered domains impersonating legit domains.

api_methods.name: Get Daily Domains
api_methods.description: Get the daily list of domains that have been registered in the past day that have a similar word to {keyword} - the keyword should not contain any domain, e.g: Google

utterances.utterance: Show me the list of domains registered yesterday that are similar to Facebook.
Can you find domains registered in the last day that resemble Amazon?
I need to see the newly registered domains that mimic Twitter.
What are the domains registered yesterday that are similar to Microsoft?
Give me the list of domains from the past day that look like Netflix.
Find the domains registered in the last 24 hours that are similar to Apple.
I want to know about the domains registered yesterday that resemble Spotify.
List the domains registered in the past day that are similar to LinkedIn.
Can you show me the domains registered yesterday that mimic Instagram?
What are the newly registered domains that look like Tesla?
